skillTree.localised_description: The highest-ranking nobles often ride into battle atop mighty Bog Beasts.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

enabled_if: Leadership is higher than 50% of base

skillTree.localised_description: The swamp will rise again, its inhabitants enjoying the blessings of the Dark Gods once more.
Maybe it is the near-constant state of regeneration that gives the hide a toughened sheen, almost impervious to claw, talon or blade.
The shadow of the Ruinous Powers looms large, protecting those who bear their mark.
Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say noâ€¦

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.localised_description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +20%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +35%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Character experience gain: +50%
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: These creatures are born to lead and marked for greatness, chosen the moment they hatch by the Fimir Matriarch of their stronghold.
The Fimir Noble's unnatural flesh twists and writhes to seal wounds moments after they are inflicted.
A creature of cunning and opportunism, the Fimir Noble can direct their warband to exploit the weaknesses of their foes.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

effects.description:
Attribute: Unyielding Assault for Fimm Caste units
	(all units in army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can never have its Melee Attack reduced during battle.

skillTree.localised_description: Any living thing on the receiving end of a blow by a Fimir Noble's Baleglyph maul would be a crumpled heap of flesh long before the weapon's atrophic magic takes its toll.
The Fimm Noble wages war with ruthless efficiency. Through unnatural cohesion and brutal coordination, no strength is wasted, no victory left unexploited.

effects.description:
Allows settlements to perform a Garrison Sally Attack with +1000 range
	(when in own region)
Replenishes 10% campaign movement range after winning a battle

skillTree.localised_description: Whether by attachment or natural bone, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.
Some creatures charge home with such fury that the very ground shakes beneath their feet.
Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.
Hand-to-hand combat is a lethal match of cut and thrust. However, itâ€™s not all about offensive strikes; parries and other defensive moves can also win the day.
A deadly blade is especially lethal when in the hands of this master death-maker, killer and slaughterer!
From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.
Such is their power and ferocity, a wound-maker will ravage the foe, cutting and pulverising until there is only one exit - death.
It is never enough. The food, the drink, the slaughter. It is never, ever enough.
The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.
Blink and you die.

skillTree.localised_name: Under the Eyes of the Gods
skillTree.localised_description: The Fimir will do anything for but a moment of attention from the Dark Gods. No act of bravery is too foolhardy, no act of cruelty too savage.

effects.description: Ability: "Under the Eyes of the Gods"

unit_ability.onscreen_name: Under the Eyes of the Gods

skillTree.localised_description: They have no worth. Their lives have no worth. They merely exist to die for the dark gods. Now drown your enemies in a tide of bodies.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -50% for Boglars and Shearls units
	(Lord's army)

Casualty replenishment rate: +8% for Boglars and Shearls units
	(Lord's army)

Leadership: +4 for Boglars and Shearls units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The elite of the Fimir warrior caste are unmatched in skill. Luckily for the civilized races, the Fimir can rarely afford to field many of such might at once.

effects.description:
Recruitment rank: +2 for Fimm Warriors and Fianna Fimm units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Fimm Warriors and Fianna Fimm units
	(Lord's army)

Upkeep: -10% for Fimm Warriors and Fianna Fimm units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: The Fimir sometimes leave the will of captured beasts unbroken, releasing them ahead of the army to sow havoc. This tactic preserves their natural ferocity, but makes them difficult to control.

effects.description:
Enables Guerilla Deployment for Feral Bog Beasts, Bog Beast Raiders, Bog Octopus and Jabberslythe units
	(Lord's army)

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: A Chaos Lord dominates â€“ lesser beings cringe from a being that is so intently under scrutiny from the Dark Gods.

effects.description:

	(Lord's army)

skillTree.localised_description: Crude they may be, the skill and might of the Fimir Warriors makes them terrifying opponents.

skillTree.localised_description: Fimir arenâ€™t the fastest creatures, but they understand the value of mobility on the battlefield. Therefore, they tame the faster, corrupted, and dangerous beasts of their swampland homes to gain a tactical advantage.

skillTree.localised_description: The Fimir arenâ€™t the only monsters inhabiting the swamps. Weaker or small-minded creatures are subjugated and used to bolster the ranks of Fimir armies.

skillTree.localised_description: Fimir are often accompanied by bigger, more terrifying swamp dwellers. Make no mistake though, the Fimir are the masters of these creatures and will use them with ruthless cunning.

skillTree.localised_description: Few can hope to overcome the veterans of the warrior caste in battle. Luckily, they are few in number.

skillTree.localised_description: Fimir are not famous for their hit and run tactics, partly because only a few who encounter them live to tell the tale.

skillTree.localised_description: Nothing brings fear to the heart like the trembling of the ground these abominations cause with every step.

skillTree.localised_description: There can be no turning back for those whose souls are turning black.
There is no other choice. There never was.
Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.
If there were annals detailing the dastardly deeds of the sackers and looters of the world, this inveterate brigand would feature heavily.
"You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

effects.description: Unit Upgrades cost: -5% for all units
Unit Upgrades cost: -10% for all units

skillTree.localised_description: No act of faith among the Fimir rivals the sacrifice of captured slaves - a dark and twisted offering to the Mud-Father FimÃºl and his children.
"This stinking mortal Hold will fall, my masters have foreseen it. Bring them ruin!"

effects.description:
Attrition suffered by defender: +10% when laying siege or encircling
	(local region)

Attrition suffered by defender: +20% when laying siege or encircling

skillTree.localised_description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

skillTree.localised_description: Knowing precisely where and when to launch an ambush, and against who, takes an unusual level of guile.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

skillTree.localised_description: War and glory before the Gods are the determining elements in every decision made; there is nothing else worth living - or dying - for.
The tendrils (and tentacles!) of the Northern Gods reach down from the poles and far across the world, twisting and corrupting all they touch.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +200
	(Lord's army)

This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

effects.description: Magic item drop chance from battle: +15%

backgroundSkills.localised_description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
